text: The 1954 Boston College Eagles football team represented Boston College as an independent during the 1954 college football season. In its fourth season under head coach Mike Holovak, the team compiled an 8-1 record and outscored opponents by a combined total of 196 to 74. The team's sole loss was to ; Xavier broke a 12-game winless streak with the victory over BC. The team played its home games at Fenway Park in Boston. ==Schedule== ==References== Boston College Category:Boston College Eagles football seasons Category:1954 in sports in Massachusetts
title: 1954 Boston College Eagles football team
